snippet: Junior Seau, regarded as one of the N.F.L.’s best linebackers over a 20-year career with the Chargers, the Dolphins and the Patriots, died of a gunshot wound to the chest at his home.
abstract: Junior Seau, regarded as one of the NFL’s best linebackers over his 20-year career, dies at age 43 of a gunshot wound to the chest at his home in Oceanside, Calif; police are investigating his death as a suicide.

byline.original: By GREG BISHOP and ROB DAVIS

lead_paragraph: Junior Seau, regarded as one of the N.F.L.’s best linebackers over a 20-year career with the Chargers, the Dolphins and the Patriots, died of a gunshot wound to the chest at his home.

headline.seo: Junior Seau, Famed N.F.L. Linebacker, Dies at 43; Suicide Is Suspected
headline.main: Junior Seau, Famed N.F.L. Linebacker, Dies at 43; Suicide Is Suspected
headline.print_headline: Seau Dies at 43; Suicide Is Suspected
